## Available Scripts

In the project directory, you can run:

### `npm start`

Runs the app in the development mode.\
Open [http://localhost:3000/Client-Web](http://localhost:3000/Client-Web) to view it in your browser.

The page will reload when you make changes.\
You may also see any lint errors in the console.


### `npm run build`

Builds the app for production to the `build` folder.\
It correctly bundles React in production mode and optimizes the build for the best performance.

### `npm run server`

Running a fake API Server. This returns json data.\
You can use it when the real API server is closed.
```
GET  http://localhost:3001/order1
GET  http://localhost:3001/stock1
GET  http://localhost:3001/item1
```
